name: TeamTrees
description:
What is this?

Just a little game about growing trees.

Made for KenneyJam 2022 (theme Growth).

How to play?

You need to fill the field with trees.

User your right and middle mouse buttons to move the camera.

Click on the icons on the right to change weather. The weather affects the trees, humans and buildings in the game.
